name: yhtml5-seed
author: yhtml5 <1417376255@qq.com>
description: The web's scaffolding tool for modern webapps

scripts.pregit: git checkout dev && clear && git status
scripts.git: git add -A && git commit -m 'auto update'  && git pull && git push && git checkout master && git merge dev && git pull && git push
scripts.postgit: git checkout dev && git merge master && clear && git status
scripts.update: rimraf site && cd site/static && mkdir vendors  && cp CNAME site/
